decisions: No project focus since active projects = 0 and last completed project is tied to a stale theme with no engagement.
Switch to standalone creation to refresh the pool of themes and seek new watcher engagement.
Avoid ocean as a core theme due to high use and zero engagement.
Prioritize slice-of-life, humor, and introspective themes as per watcher likes.
Do not initiate new projects until a theme or format receives multiple watcher likes.
